# Dotnet 9 Docs

- [What's new in .NET libraries for .NET 9](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-9/libraries.md): Learn about the new .NET libraries features introduced in .NET 9.
- [What's new in .NET 9](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-9/overview.md): Learn about the new .NET features introduced in .NET 9 for the runtime, libraries, and SDK. Also find links to what's new in other areas, such as ASP.NET Core.
- [What's new in .NET 9 runtime](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-9/runtime.md): Learn about the new .NET features introduced in the .NET 9 runtime.
- [What's new in the SDK and tooling for .NET 9](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-9/sdk.md): Learn about the new .NET SDK features introduced in .NET 9, including for unit testing, Terminal Logger, tool roll-forward, and build script analyzers.
